the regression was reported on Linux BE only.  it had better applying this fix to Linux BE only.  something like:
if LINUXPPC
if  LITTLE_ENDIAN
= 96;
else
= 151;
endif
elsif AIXPPC
= 96;
....
Keep in mind that AIX is not LITTLE_ENDIAN, such that the existing fix will apply to AIX too.
@zl-wang Do we need to account for the Java version as well? I believe the regression was specifically for IBM Java 8.
there is no Linux BE releases after java8

Only IBM builds plinux BE, there are no builds for Java 11+ created at OpenJ9 or Adopt. Also, if the cause was the OMR change and not the compiler change, then it follows the fix applies to all versions.
